106765.「聞きましたよ カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n カンダタ親分さんと 月世界へ\n 悪者:
I heard that Robbin' 'Ood's henchman A! I hear
you and Robbin' 'Ood are headed to the moon to
kill the bad guys!

106766.「子分Ｂの私も お手伝いしたいのですが\n あいにく 生まれてこのかた 無職でし:
I, henchman B, would like to help you, but
unfortunately, I have been unemployed all my
life and have no skills or spells...

106767.「ですが おふたりのご活躍を ここで\n ひたすらに 祈ってますよ！\n ささっ:
But I'll just sit here and wish you both the
best! Whispers. Go on, Big Horn!

106768.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: Have a good day, Robbin' 'Ood henchman A!

106769.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
Oh my god, <pc> has arrived on the
moon!

106770.「カグヤ＝ムーン様が おそれていた通り\n 侵略者の王が ふたたび 大船団を率い:
As Master Kaguya Moon had feared, the king of
the invaders has once again invaded the moon
with a large fleet of ships...

106771.「今度こそ 降伏せよと命じる侵略者に\n 姫様は 救世主カンダタ様がいる限り\n:
When the invaders commanded her to surrender this time, the princess resisted, saying the moon wouldn't be destroyed as long as she had
her savior, Robbin' 'Ood.

106772.「それに 腹を立てた 侵略者の王\n リルグレイドは 我らが姫様を\n やつらの:
The invader king, Lil' Gray, was so offended
that he took our princess to his mother ship!

106774.「カグヤから預かった ヘンテコな首飾りで\n あいつ 俺様に 助けを求めてきてな:
He came to me for help with this weird
necklace Kaguya gave him. I rushed to the
moon, and this is what I got.

106775.「これも 子分のテメーが\n しっかり 月を見張ってねえからだ！\n どうしてく:
This is all because your henchman isn't
keeping a proper eye on the moon! What are you
going to do about it!

106776.「カンダタ様。どうか 気をお静めください。\n 今は 姫様をお助けするのが 先決:
Dear Robbin' 'Ood. Please calm yourself. What
is important now is to save the princess.

106777.「あなた様に授けられた 首飾りで\n どうか 囚われの姫に\n ご連絡を とって:
Would you be so kind as to use the necklace
you have given me to contact the captive
princess?

106779.「おいっ カグヤ！\n カンダタ様が 月まで来てやったぞ！\n 返事をしやがれい:
Hey, Kaguya! Robbin' 'Ood sent you to the
moon! Answer me!

106780.カグヤの首飾りから 声が聞こえてくる……。: I hear voices coming from Kaguya's necklace...

106781.「おお……その うるわしき声は カンダタ様。\n はるばる 月まで おいでくださ:
Oh...that annoying voice, Robbin' 'Ood. You
have come all the way to the moon. How
grateful I am...

106783.「わらわは 大事ありませぬ。\n されど 侵略者の王に 月の秘宝をよこせ。\n:
I am of no importance. But give me the Moon Treasure to the king of the invaders, or I will destroy the moon. Or else I will destroy
the moon.

106784.「なんだとお！？\n 月の秘宝は 俺様のモンだ！\n どこのどいつか知らねえが:
What the hell? The Moon Treasure is mine! I
don't know who you are or where you're from,
but I'll kick your ass!

106785.「カンダタ様……なんと頼もしきお言葉。 \n やはり あなた様こそ 伝説の救世主:
Robbin' 'Ood...how encouraging. After all, you
are the legendary savior...

106786.「んなこたぁ どうでもいいんだ！\n どうやって そこに殴り込みゃいいんだ！？\:
I don't give a shit! How the hell am I
supposed to get in there? Just tell me!

106787.「どうか お鎮まりくだされ カンダタ様。\n わらわが 囚われている 侵略者の母:
Please calm yourself, Robbin' 'Ood. As you can see, the mother ship of the invaders in which we are being held is hovering above the
palace.

106788.「侵略者たちなら いざしらず\n 我ら 月の民には 母船まで飛ぶことは\n とう:
We moon people are not capable of flying to
the mother ship... as the invaders are...

106789.「じゃあ あきらめろってぇのか！\n 俺様の月の秘宝を どうしてくれる！！:
So you're just gonna give up? ! What are you
doing with my Moon Treasure!

106791.「太古の昔……こたびと 同様に\n 侵略者たちが 月へと 襲いきた時\n 伝説の:
In ancient times... when the invaders attacked the moon as they have done this time, the legendary savior of the moon used this sacred
tool.

106792.「ひとけりで 空の彼方まで 駆ける\n あの 空とぶくつが あれば……。: If only I had those Skysoar Shoes...

106793.「空とぶくつ……だと？ \n なんだぁ？ どっかで 聞いたような……。:
Skysoar Shoes...? What? I think I heard that
somewhere...

106794.「かつての救世主様は 空とぶくつにて\n 侵略者の宇宙船へ 乗り込み\n きゃつ:
The former Messiah of the world boarded the
invaders' spaceship in Skysoar Shoes and drove
them away.

106795.「伝説の救世主 ジンダタ様の神具 \n 空とぶくつならば この宇宙船までも\n:
If only the legendary savior Jindata's Skysoar
Shoes could fly all the way to this
spaceship...

106796.「ジンダタだとっ！？\n そりゃあ 俺様の ご先祖様の名前だぜ！: Zindata! That's the name of my ancestor!

106798.「おう 間違いねえぜ。\n 月と俺様の間にゃあ ずいぶんと\n おかしな因縁が:
Oh, there's no doubt about it. The moon and I
have a very strange history, don't we?

106799.「ご先祖様は 自分の墓に お宝を遺したと \n 代々 伝えられてる。\n きっと:
It's been passed down from generation to
generation that our ancestors left treasures
in their tombs. I bet it's Skysoar Shoes.

106800.「おいっ <pc>！\n テメーは 今すぐ ご先祖様の墓へ行き\n 空とぶくつを:
Hey, <pc>! You go to your ancestors'
tombs right now and get me some Skysoar Shoes!

106801.「俺様の先祖 ジンダタの墓は\n プクランド大陸 キラキラ大風車塔 入口そばの\:
My ancestor Zindata's tomb should be on the
riverbank by the entrance to Glitter Windmill
Tower, Pukuland Continent!

106802.「俺様は テメーが戻ってくるまで\n 昼寝……いや 英気を養っておく。\n いい:
I'm going to take a nap... or at least keep my
wits about me until you get back. Now go find
them!

106803.「<pc>様……お願いいたします。\n どうか 救世主カンダタ様のため\n 空と:
<pc>...please. Please find Skysoar
Shoes for our savior, Robbin' 'Ood...!

106804.「おや カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n とっくに 月へ向かったと思っていましたが\n:
Oh, Robbin' 'Ood, henchman A! I thought you
had already left for the moon.

106805.「ささっ。どうぞ ビッグホルンへ！: Whisper it. Go ahead, Big Horn!

106806.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: Have a good day, Robbin' 'Ood henchman A!

106807.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
Oh my god, <pc> has arrived on the
moon!

106808.「救世主 カンダタ様！\n あなたの従者 <cs_pchero>様が\n ようや:
Our savior, Master Robbin' 'Ood! Your squire
<cs_pchero> has finally returned!

106809.「よーし <cs_pchero>。\n 今度こそ あの 胸クソ悪い\n ドロドロ:
All right, <cs_pchero>. This time we're
going to beat that disgusting slimeball to a
pulp!

106811.カンダタは 空とぶくつを はいた！: Robbin' 'Ood puts on his Skysoar Shoes!

106812.「いてて……。\n こりゃあ どこに着いたんだ？: Where the hell did we end up?

106814.「そなたの言いなりになど ならぬぞ。\n 侵略者の王 リルグレイド！:
I will not be at your mercy. Lil' Gray, king
of the invaders!

106815.「きっと 伝承どおり 救世主様が\n わらわを 助けに来てくださるはず！\n さ:
Surely, as the legend goes, the Messiah will
come to rescue me! And then you will be
finished!

106816.「……愚カナ。８７６１２７３時間前\n 我々ヲ撃退シタ 野蛮人ナラバ\n スデニ:
The barbarians who repulsed us 8761273 hours
ago have confirmed that they have ceased their
activities.

106817.「降伏セヨ カグヤ＝ムーン。\n 助ケガ 来ル確率ハ\n ０.０００３ぱーせんと:
Surrender, Kaguya Moon. The probability of
success is 0.0003 percent.

106820.「侵入者……？\n ドウシテ 野蛮人ガ コノ母船ニ。\n せきゅりてぃ・えらー:
Intruders...? The barbarians are on my mother
ship. A se-retiree...?

106822.「いいか！ 月の秘宝は 俺様のモンだ。\n 邪魔するヤツは ぶっとばす！\n …:
Listen up! The Moon Treasure is mine. I'll
crush anyone who gets in my way! Let's go!

106824.「おお……カンダタ様！\n きっと また来てくださると\n わらわは 信じており:
Oh... Robbin' 'Ood! I knew you would come
again!

106825.「再ビ 戦イヲ挑ンダトコロデ\n 勝利ノ確率ハ 変化シナイ。\n 野蛮人ノ 知能:
I have tried to fight again, but the odds of
victory are unchanged. The barbarians'
intelligence is lower than ours.

106826.「へっ。ごたくを 並べやがって。\n 今度こそ 勝つのは 俺様だ！\n ……いく:
Heh. You're just laying this crap on us. This
time, it's me who wins! Let's go!

106827.「最優先事項。\n 侵入者ノ 排除ヲ 執行スル！！:
Top Priority. Intruders are to be removed from
the premises!

106828.「アリエ…ナイ……。\n 野蛮人……８７６１２７３時間ノ 間ニ\n ココマデ 進:
Alie... no... barbarian... has evolved in
8761273 hours...?

106829.「どうでい！\n 俺様の強さを 思い知ったか！: How do you like that? You see how strong I am!

106831.「あらーと。 \n 管理者ノ 心音停止二ヨリ\n 自爆装置ヲ 起動スル。総員 退:
Oh my. The administrator's heartbeat has
stopped and the self-destruct mechanism
activated. All personnel, evacuate.

106832.「キケン……キケ……キケキケキケキケ\n ピー！ ガガーガーガーガー！！！:
Kiken...kike...kike kike kike kike kike
peepee! Gagar gagar gagar!!!!

106834.「やべえ ずらかるぞっ！: Oh no, we're getting out of here!

106835.「おう！ <pc>っ！！\n テメーも 無事だったようだな。: Oh! <pc>! Looks like you're safe too.

106836.「救世主カンダタ様……\n そして 従者<pc>様。:
Our savior, Master Robbin' 'Ood...and his
squire <pc>.

106837.「こたびは 月の民のために\n 悪しき侵略者どもを 退治いただき\n まことに:
I thank you very much for defeating these evil
invaders for the people of the moon.

106838.「へっ。あの程度のヤロー\n 俺様と <pc>にかかれば\n 朝メシ前だぜ！:
Heh. That kind of shit is nothing compared to
what I and <pc> can do for you!

106839.「おたわむれを。\n 救世主カンダタ様の おチカラなくば\n 月は 今ごろ 滅び:
Enjoy yourselves. Without the power of Robbin'
'Ood, our savior, the moon would have perished
by now.

106840.「ああ もう わかったわかった！\n なんでもいいから\n とっとと 約束のアレ:
Oh, my God. Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay! Just
give me that thing you promised me, whatever
it is!

106842.「これこそが 月の秘宝……。\n 所有する者に 不老不死のチカラを与える\n 神:
This is the Moon Treasure, a mysterious tree
that grants its owner the power of
immortality.

106843.「王宮に祀られた この樹が \n 光輝いている間だけ 我等 月の民は\n 老いや:
Only while this tree, enshrined in the royal palace, shines brightly can we, the people of the moon, be protected from old age and
disease...

106845.「救世主カンダタ様。\n 月の秘宝……いえ 月のすべてを\n あなた様に 差し上:
Dear Robbin' 'Ood, the savior of the world. I
give you the Moon Treasure... or rather, all
of the Moon.

106847.「……カンダタ様。\n どうか わらわの夫となり\n 月世界を 治めてはください:
Robbin' 'Ood-sama. Please, will you become my
husband and rule over the moon?

106849.「あなた様の強さ そして 優しさに\n わらわの心は 奪われてしまいました。\n:
Your strength and kindness have stolen my
heart. I beg you. Please, my child...

106852.「月のすべてってのは 魅力的だが \n 俺様にゃあ 世界の１００大秘宝を全部まる:
All the Moon is tempting, but I have a big
dream to get all the 100 greatest Moon
Treasures in the world.

106853.「こんなトコで モタモタしてらんねえぜ。\n そんじゃあ あばよ。:
I don't have time to waste at a place like
this. Well then, good-bye.

106854.「で……では\n せめて 月の秘宝だけでも\n お持ちくだされ！: So...at least bring me the Moon Treasure!

106855.「死なねえカラダになったら \n 盗みのスリルが 味わえねえじゃねーか。:
If my body doesn't die, I won't be able to
enjoy the thrill of stealing.

106856.「生きるか死ぬかの 大勝負に勝って \n 見たこともないような お宝を手に入れる:
Winning the great game of life and death and
receiving treasures never seen before. That's
what the great thief Robbin' 'Ood lives for.

106858.「ま ヨボヨボの ジジイになって \n 隠居したくなったら オメーに世話になるぜ:
Well, when I get old and decrepit and want to
retire, I'll look after you. Until then, I'll
leave you the Moon Treasure!

106860.「わらわは この月より…… \n あなた様の おかえりを\n いつまでも お待ち:
Since this month I have been waiting for your
return.

106862.「よーし！ めでたく 月の秘宝も\n 俺様のモンに なったし\n 地上へ戻るぞ！:
All right! Now that the Moon Treasure is mine,
I'm going back down to earth! <pc>!

106863.「よ～し <pc>！\n それじゃあ オルフェアに戻るぜっ！:
Alright <pc>! Well then, back to
Orphea!

106865.「おかえりなさい カンダタ子分Ａさん！\n おふたりとも ご無事で何よりです！:
Welcome back, Robbin' 'Ood henchman A! I'm so
glad you two are safe!

106866.「<pc>。俺様のために\n よく 働いてくれたな。\n さすがは 最強の子分だ:
<pc>. You've worked hard for me.
You're the best henchman I've ever seen!

106867.「ほれっ。侵略者のヤローの 船から\n こっそり盗んできた お宝だ。\n 今回の:
Here. I secretly stole this treasure from the
invader's ship. Keep it for this time!

106868.「ふ～っ。しかし 月の秘宝を手に入れるのは \n なかなか 骨の折れる仕事だった:
Phew~. However, receiving the Moon Treasure
was quite a painstaking job. I think I'll take
it easy and rest for a while.

106869.「また 新しいお宝を 奪いにいく時は \n テメーにも 働いてもらう！\n それ:
And when we go back to take the new treasure,
you'll be working for us! And by then, you
better be stronger than ever!

106870.「カンダタ親分さん！\n 子分Ｂの私に お駄賃は ないんですか！？:
Robbin' 'Ood! Don't you have any money for me,
henchman B?

106871.「ん？ 悪ぃ悪ぃ。すっかり 忘れてたぜ！\n そのへんで なにかしら みつくろっ:
Hmm? Sorry, sorry. I totally forgot! I'll find
something around here and give it to you, so
follow me!

106873.「……しかし 初めて会った時は 敵だった\n テメーが 俺様の右ウデになるとは\:
But it's strange that you, who were my enemy
when we first met, have become my Right Arm
<pc>.

107691.「救世主 カンダタ様！\n あなたの従者 <cs_pchero>様が\n 空とぶ:
Our savior, Lord Robbin' 'Ood! Your servant
<cs_pchero> has returned having received his
Skysoar Shoes!

107692.「おう。待ちわびたぜ <cs_pchero>！: Oh. I've been waiting for you <cs_pchero>!

107693.「まずは 空とぶくつを\n こっちに もらうぜ。いいな？<yesno><clos:
First of all, I'm going to ask you for some
Skysoar Shoes. Okay?<yesno><close>

107694.「ふざけてる場合じゃねえ！\n 早く 空とぶくつを よこせってんだ！\n な！:
This is no time to be stupid! Give me those
Skysoar Shoes! Hey! Hey!<yesno><close>

107696.「ほう……。\n これが ご先祖様が 使ったっていう\n 空とぶくつか。えらく:
So... this is the Skysoar Shoes used by our
ancestors. It's very shabby.

107697.「まあいい。\n さっそく 侵略者のトコに 殴り込むぞ！\n 俺様に つかまれ！:
Oh well. Let's get to work on that invader
right now! Hold on to me! <cs_pchero>!

107698.<cs_pchero>は カンダタのマントのすそを\nしっかり つかんだ。:
<cs_pchero> firmly grasped the edge of
Robbin' 'Ood's cloak.

107700.カンダタは 空とぶくつを はいた！: Robbin' 'Ood puts on his Skysoar Shoes!

107701.「おふたりとも お気を付けて！ \n どうか 姫様を お救いくださいまし！！:
Watch out, both of you! Please save the
princess!

107702.「原住民ノ 支配者 カグヤ＝ムーン。\n 月ノ秘宝ヲ 渡スカ 星ゴト滅ブカ。\n:
Kaguya Moon, ruler of the natives. Give me the
Moon's treasures, or I will destroy the stars.
I will make a rational decision.

114852.なんと <cs_pchero>と カンダタは\n侵略者の母船の 外壁に到着した！:
Oh my, <cs_pchero> and Robbin' 'Ood have
reached the outer hull of the invaders' mother
ship!

114853.「なんだ。こりゃあ 宇宙船の外じゃねえか！\n どうやって 中に入るんでい。:
What the hell. This is outside the spaceship!
How are we going to get inside?

114854.「ええい 硬い壁だな。\n コノヤロ 開けっ！ 開かねえか！！\n どりゃーーー:
Yeah, it's a hard wall. Come on! Open up! It
won't open! Holy shit!

114855.なんと カンダタは 外壁をけやぶり\n勢いあまって <cs_pchero>を道連:
Robbin' 'Ood, in a fit of rage, shattered the
hull and fell into the spaceship with
<cs_pchero> in tow!

114857.「カグヤは 俺様にまかせろ。\n 月世界の王宮で おちあおうぜ！\n <cs_p:
I'll take care of Kaguya. We'll make love in
the royal palace on the moon! <cs_pchero>！！

114859.<cs_pchero>と カンダタは\nバラバラに ふっとばされてしまった……。:
<cs_pchero> and Robbin' 'Ood were blown to
pieces...

114860.「そうそう 空とぶくつの くつ底から\n ご先祖様が遺した 地図が見つかってな…:
Yes, I found a map left behind by my ancestors at the bottom of my Skysoar Shoes...oops. The rest of the story will be a treat for another
time.

114861.「世界の１００大……いや ９９大秘宝は\n 俺様とテメーで 全部 手に入れるんだ:
I'm going to get all the 100...no, 99
treasures in the world with you and me. Follow
me, even to the end of the world!

114862.「じゃあな <pc>。\n 俺様の 最強の子分よ！\n 次の お宝探しまで くた:
See you later, <pc>. My most powerful
henchman! Don't go down until the next
treasure hunt.

114903.「いってらっしゃい カンダタ子分Ａさん！: Have a good day, Robbin' 'Ood henchman A!

114904.なんと <pc>は 月に到着した！:
Oh my god, <pc> has arrived on the
moon!
